org.ujorm.tools.xml.config

Interface Formatter


  • public interface Formatter
    A value formatter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CharSequence format(Object value, ApiElement element, String attributeName)
      Format an objet value to a string ouptut, special characters will be escaped later.

    • Method Detail

      • format

        @Nonnull
CharSequence format(@Nullable
                             Object value,
                             @Nonnull
                             ApiElement element,
                             @Nullable
                             String attributeName)
        Format an objet value to a string ouptut, special characters will be escaped later.
        Parameters:
        value - A data value
        element - A related element
        attributeName - A name of the attribute, if any.
        Returns:
        A target non-nnul sequence is required.
